dialog: Which animal and vehicle do you think is the coolest?
prompt: An adorable, fluffy baby Cat with a wide-eyed, intensely curious expression and big expressive eyes. It is looking directly into the lens. The animal is pressing its nose very close to the camera lens, creating a funny "big nose" perspective. The Convertible Car is parked clearly visible in the background. The baby Cat is wearing a cute Vintage Corduroy Safari Explorer Outfit and a tiny Rainbow Gradient Tiny Satchel Bag. The vehicle has Matte Black with Red Accents details. Render the vehicle with high mechanical accuracy suitable for a miniature scale. The scene takes place on a cobblestone street in a charming European village during a sunny morning with clear blue skies. Extreme close-up with a wide-angle fisheye lens effect. The animal's nose and face dominate the frame, funny and adorable. The vehicle is visible in the distorted background. Sharp focus on the Cat and the vehicle. Cinematic depth of field. Art Style: Hyper Realistic (Cinematic). Aspect Ratio 9:16 (Vertical).

dialog: First there is a Cat in a Superhero Cape and Mask driving his Supercar.
Hi! I'm competing in this audition. Please vote for me by hitting the like button!
prompt: An adorable, fluffy baby Cat with a laughing expression and big expressive eyes. It is actively driving the miniature Supercar. The Supercar has an open cabin with a steering wheel. The baby Cat sits confidently in the driver's seat, paws gripping the steering wheel at the 10 and 2 positions.  The baby Cat is wearing a cute Cozy Knitted Wool Superhero Cape and Mask and a tiny Fluffy Sherpa Aviator Goggles. The vehicle has Galaxy Nebula Swirls details. Render the vehicle with high mechanical accuracy suitable for a miniature scale. The scene takes place on a professional race track with bright stadium lights during a bright sunny afternoon. The camera is positioned slightly to the side and front, capturing the full length of the Supercar from the very front tip to the back end. The vehicle is moving diagonally across the frame. Ensure no part of the vehicle is cropped out. Sharp focus on the Cat and the vehicle. Cinematic depth of field. Art Style: Hyper Realistic (Cinematic). Aspect Ratio 9:16 (Vertical).

dialog: The second one is a Cat in a Vintage Varsity Letterman Jacket driving his Bulldozer.

The camera is positioned slightly to the side and front, capturing the full length of the Bulldozer from the very front tip to the back end. The vehicle is moving diagonally across the frame. Ensure no part of the vehicle is cropped out. Sharp focus on the Cat and the vehicle. Cinematic depth of field. Art Style: Hyper Realistic (Cinematic). Aspect Ratio 9:16 (Vertical).
